inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of male Chronic Pelvic Pain Syndrome Type III
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pelvic pain duration of at least 3 months
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Urinary tract infection within the last year
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Antiviral therapy or antibiotics within the last 3 months
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a diagnosis of male Chronic Pelvic Pain Syndrome Type III, is between 18-65 years old, and has had pelvic pain for at least 3 months. He does not have any urinary tract infections or sexually transmitted diseases within the last year or 3 months respectively.
